chapter.title: Changes for &PRODUCT; Users
chapter.para: &PRODUCT; Users are people who use the &PRODUCT; application on a regular basis for the purposes of maintaining a functional network. Users make use of the Web UI, and notifications, and are mostly data focused in their tasks.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following changes for &PRODUCT; Users have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

variablelist.title: Features, Enhancements, and Bug Fixes for Users

listitem.para: Performance of the Outage Editor has been improved. These changes were partially implimented in &LASTPRODVER;, and have been refined in &PRODVER;. (Bug #1225)
A UI Bug with the User Admin UI where some buttons did not work properly has been addressed. (Bug #4034)
